item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded: This is the Parent page for the homepage sections. Don't edit this page, instead, go to Settings - Reading and set it as Front Page.

item.title: Slider (vcard)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" css=".vc_custom_1491911885429{background-image: url(http://nexarthemes.com/nexx/vcard/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2017/04/slider.jpg?id=11) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]

Meet Nexx VCard

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]Nexx is a unique flexible multi-purpose theme for every business and creative professional. A great collection of homepages and inner pages, researched and developed for the most popular business niches. Earn more clients right now. Just try it.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About Me (vcard)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_section full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" css=".vc_custom_1491914525805{background-image: url(http://nexarthemes.com/nexx/vcard/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2017/04/about-me.jpg?id=37) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492636938611{padding-top: 85px !important;}"]

Just a Few Words About Me

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1491913507516{padding-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]Nexx is an excellent theme series allowing you to build your site the easy way, and it lets you tell your story in a powerful narrative in an engaging way, making it perfect for all businesses. Get started with either of the demos with only one click![/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]You can effortlessly create your website with One Click Install. Content, images, theme options and even sliders are automatically imported. in the process. There is no need for additional settings.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]You can create the perfect header for your website. Choose between various layouts and behaviours. You get 3 Layout Styles.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]Switch between full width or boxed and control the container width on the majority of device screens.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]12.11.2017[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_btn title="CONTACT ME" style="custom" custom_background="#ffffff" custom_text="#d60274" align="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1496905791010{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 110px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fthemeforest.net%2Fitem%2Fnexx-multi-purpose-business-wordpress-theme%2F19851428||target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]

item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
<label> Your Name (required) [text* your-name] </label>
<label> Your Email (required) [email* your-email] </label>
<label> Subject [text your-subject] </label>
<label> Your Message [textarea your-message] </label>
[submit "Send"] VCard "[your-subject]" [your-name] <wordpress@nexarthemes.com> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject]
Message Body: [your-message]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on VCard (http://nexarthemes.com/nexx/vcard) office@margineanholding.ro Reply-To: [your-email]
0 0
VCard "[your-subject]" VCard <wordpress@nexarthemes.com> Message Body: [your-message]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on VCard (http://nexarthemes.com/nexx/vcard) [your-email] Reply-To: office@margineanholding.ro
0 0 Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short.
